purpleculture_pinyin:
sōu
Japanese variant of 搜
Японский вариант поиска
rtega_mnemonic:
搜搜RS
捜捜		search, seek, investigate
  • hand 扌 of an old man 叟/叟 seeking something long lost
heisig_constituent: search, finger, fingers, Buddha’s hand, monkey, sun, day, stick, crotch
koohiiStory1: The monkey searches around with his fingers for his crotch.
koohiiStory2: If you are familiar with the Monkey legends (西遊記 Journey to the West) there is a good image for this character: While searching for the end of the universe, monkey reaches to his crotch and urinates on Buddha´s fingers. (Update: new link http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RYXFppaKLL4).
jp_example_words:
捜査(そうさ): search (esp. in criminal investigations), investigation
捜索(そうさく): search (esp. for someone or something missing), investigation
捜す(さがす): search, seek, look for
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You want to get your fingers on the humble stool, so you dedicate your life to search for it. Wait, the humble stool? You know, like the holy grail or the arc of the covenant, but it's called the humble stool. It's from some bible or something, I promise.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Now you have to search through a bunch of religious texts for this humble stool with your fingers. Don't go too fast and get paper cuts!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You search and you search and, unfortunately, you spend your entire life searching and you die without finding the humble stool. But don't worry, your soul (そう) comes back and now you get to continue your search but with afterlife powers!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You dedicated your soul to searching, and now that your soul is free from its body, you can continue the search until you find it!
Ru_Radicals: ｜, 又 (опять), 扎, 日 (день), 田 (рисовое поле)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: I say (申) again (又) with my hand (扌) I'm searching

sōu
яп. вм. 搜
Radicals: 扌, 申, 又  (fingers, humble, stool)
Meaning Mnemonic
You want to get your fingers on the humble stool, so you dedicate your life to search for it. Wait, the humble stool? You know, like the holy grail or the arc of the covenant, but it's called the humble stool. It's from some bible or something, I promise.
Now you have to search through a bunch of religious texts for this humble stool with your fingers. Don't go too fast and get paper cuts!
Reading Mnemonic
You search and you search and, unfortunately, you spend your entire life searching and you die without finding the humble stool. But don't worry, your soul (そう) comes back and now you get to continue your search but with afterlife powers!
You dedicated your soul to searching, and now that your soul is free from its body, you can continue the search until you find it!
